plot outline: Watch the full movie, CID Eesha, only on Eros Now. CID Eesha is a 2013 Indian Kannada film, directed by N Rajesh and produced by C Umakantha Raju. The film stars Jaggesh, Mayuri, Komal Kumar, Rangayana Raghu in lead roles. The film had musical score by Vijay Bharathi.
